verses.verse: And when <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> no sons <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> her <S%H269>sister<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H3051>Give<s%> me <S%H1121>sons<s%>, or <S%H369>else<s%> I <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Am I in <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H4513>stead<s%>, who has withheld from you the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb<s%>?

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold my <S%H519>maid<s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%>, go <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H3205>her<s%>; and she shall bear upon my <S%H1290>knees<s%>, that I may also have sons by <S%H1129>her<s%>.
And she <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> her <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>: and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went in unto <S%H935>her<s%>.
And <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1777>judged<s%> <S%H8085>me<s%>, and has also heard my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and has <S%H5414>given<s%> me a <S%H1121>son<s%>: therefore <S%H7121>called<s%> she his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1835>Dan<s%>.
And <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>'s <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H3205>again<s%>, and gave birth to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, With <S%H430>great<s%> <S%H5319>wrestlings<s%> have I <S%H6617>wrestled<s%> with my <S%H269>sister<s%>, and I have <S%H3201>prevailed<s%>: and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>.

When <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H5975>left<s%> <S%H3205>bearing<s%>, she <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> her <S%H8198>maid<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.
And <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%>'s <S%H8198>maid<s%> gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>.
And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, A <S%H1409>troop<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%>: and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%>.
And <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%>'s <S%H8198>maid<s%> gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.
And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Happy am <S%H837>I<s%>, for the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> will call me <S%H833>blessed<s%>: and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H836>Asher<s%>.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> went <S%H3212>in<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%>. Then <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3812>Leah<s%>, Give <S%H5414>me<s%>, I pray you of your <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4592>her<s%>, Is it a small matter that you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%>? and would you take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> <S%H7354>also<s%>? And Rachel <S%H559>said<s%>, Therefore he shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with you to <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening<s%>, and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, you must come <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H7936>me<s%>; for surely I have <S%H7936>hired<s%> you with my <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%>. And he <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her that <S%H3915>night<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> unto <S%H3812>Leah<s%>, and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me my <S%H7939>hire<s%>, <S%H834>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> my <S%H8198>maiden<s%> to my <S%H376>husband<s%>: and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>.
And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H3205>again<s%>, and gave birth to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H2064>endowed<s%> me with a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2065>dowry<s%>; <S%H6471>now<s%> will my <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H2082>live<s%> with <S%H3205>me<s%>, because I have born him <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>: and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>.
And <S%H310>afterwards<s%> she gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H6605>her<s%>, and opened her <S%H7358>womb<s%>.
And she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> has taken <S%H622>away<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach<s%>:
And she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H3254>add<s%> to me <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And it came to <S%H7354>pass<s%>, when Rachel had <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, Send me <S%H7971>away<s%>, that I may <S%H3212>go<s%> unto my own <S%H4725>place<s%>, and to my <S%H776>country<s%>.

<S%H5414>Give<s%> me my <S%H802>wives<s%> and my <S%H3206>sons<s%>, <S%H2004>for<s%> whom I have <S%H5647>served<s%> you and let me <S%H3212>go<s%>: for you <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H5656>service<s%> which I have done <S%H5647>you<s%>

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4672>him<s%>, I pray you if I have found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H5172>tarry<s%>: for I have learned by experience that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me for your <S%H1558>sake<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5344>Appoint<s%> me your <S%H7939>wages<s%>, and I will give <S%H5414>it<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3045>him<s%>, You know <S%H834>how<s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> you and <S%H834>how<s%> your cattle was with <S%H4735>me<s%>.

For it was <S%H4592>little<s%> which you had before <S%H6440>I<s%> <S%H6555>came<s%>, and it is now increased unto a <S%H7230>multitude<s%>; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you since my <S%H7272>coming<s%>: and now <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H6213>provide<s%> for my own house <S%H1004>also<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What shall I give <S%H5414>you<s%>? And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, you shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> me any <S%H3972>thing<s%>: if you will <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> for <S%H7725>me<s%>, I will again <S%H7462>feed<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H6629>flock<s%>:

I will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through all your <S%H6629>flock<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5493>removing<s%> from there all the <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%>, and all the <S%H2345>brown<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, and the <S%H2921>spotted<s%> and <S%H5348>speckled<s%> among the <S%H5795>goats<s%>: and of such shall be my <S%H7939>hire<s%>.

So shall my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> for me in <S%H3117>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come<s%>, when it shall <S%H935>come<s%> for my <S%H7939>hire<s%> before your <S%H6440>face<s%>: every <S%H3605>one<s%> that is not <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> among the <S%H5795>goats<s%>, and <S%H2345>brown<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, that shall be counted stolen with <S%H1589>me<s%>.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3863>Behold<s%>, I would it might be according to your <S%H1697>word<s%>.

And he <S%H5493>removed<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> the he <S%H8495>goats<s%> that were <S%H6124>streaked<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%>, and all the she <S%H5795>goats<s%> that were <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%>, and every one that had some <S%H3836>white<s%> in <S%H2345>it<s%>, and all the brown among the <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%> between himself and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%>'s <S%H6629>flocks<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him <S%H4731>rods<s%> of <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3839>poplar<s%>, and of the <S%H3869>hazel<s%> and chesnut <S%H6196>tree<s%>; and <S%H6478>peeled<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H6479>streaks<s%> in <S%H3836>them<s%>, and made the white <S%H4286>appear<s%> which was in the <S%H4731>rods<s%>.

And he <S%H3322>set<s%> the <S%H4731>rods<s%> which he had <S%H6478>peeled<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> in the <S%H7298>gutters<s%> in the <S%H4325>watering<s%> <S%H8268>troughs<s%> when the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>, that they should <S%H3179>conceive<s%> when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H3179>conceived<s%> before the <S%H4731>rods<s%>, and brought <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H6124>streaked<s%>, <S%H5348>speckled<s%>, and <S%H2921>spotted<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> did <S%H6504>separate<s%> the <S%H3775>lambs<s%>, and <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6124>streaked<s%>, and all the <S%H2345>brown<s%> in the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%>; and he <S%H7896>put<s%> his own <S%H5739>flocks<s%> by <S%H7896>themselves<s%>, and put them not unto <S%H3837>Laban<s%>'s <S%H6629>cattle<s%>.

And it came to <S%H7194>pass<s%>, whensoever the stronger <S%H6629>cattle<s%> did <S%H3179>conceive<s%>, that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H4731>rods<s%> before the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> in the <S%H7298>gutters<s%>, that they might <S%H3179>conceive<s%> among the <S%H4731>rods<s%>.
But when the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> were <S%H5848>feeble<s%>, he put them not <S%H7760>in<s%>: so the <S%H5848>feebler<s%> were <S%H3837>Laban<s%>'s, and the <S%H7194>stronger<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6555>increased<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%>, and had <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H6629>cattle<s%>, and <S%H8198>maidservants<s%>, and <S%H5650>menservants<s%>, and <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>.
